content: उद्यमः {@--1@} Raising, elevation. {@--2@} Strenuous or assiduous effort, exertion, diligence, perseverance; निशम्य चैनां तपसे कृतोद्यमां <ls>Ku. 5. 3</ls>; शशाक मेना न नियंतुमुद्यमात् <ls n="Ku. 5.">5</ls>, firm resolve; उद्यमेन हि सिध्यंति कार्याणि न मनोरथैः <ls>Pt. 2. 131.</ls> {@--3@} Readiness, preparation; गंतुमुद्यमो विहितः became ready to go <ls>Pt. 1.</ls>
